targets.expr: sum by(instance, node, internal_ip, kernel_version, kubelet_version, os_image, pod_cidr, system_uuid) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__range]))

max by(node, kubelet_version) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
or on()
(
  vector(0) unless on() last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)

max by(node, kernel_version) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
or on()
(
  vector(0) unless on() last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)

sum by(node) (max_over_time(node_namespace:container_cpu_usage_seconds:irate{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
/
max by(node) (max_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="cpu"}[$__interval]))

sum by (node) (max_over_time(node_namespace:container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
/
max by(node) (max_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__interval]))
